titleStmt.title: Berlin and Aberdeen fragments from a roll of Iliad 9

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Submit - Updated xml with P.Aberd dclp-hybrid idno.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - A bit of tidying up. TEXT: No scribal acute in fr. 1.7; delete repeated τειμη in 1.8; dot final mu in μαρναμ̣[ in 1.16; dot pi of πάντα in 1.20; dot second delta in 1.21; change final sigmas to medials in 1.23 and dot eta. Capitalize ἐννοσίγαιος in fr. 2.7; remove the extra space before square bracket in 2.8; remove <::> in 2.11 and replace diairesis with a suprastroke and commentary re: vowel quantity; insert scribal acute ἔλαχ ό(´)ν in 2.12; add square bracket κ[ρείων in 2.13; add scribal grave Δα̣ν α(`)ῶν in 2.16; replace final sigma in 2.19; do ἐ]π̣έεσσι̣ν̣ in 2.21; encode γ]ά̣ ρ(`) in 2.22; dot τοῦ̣ in 2.23. META: display name “Berlin and Aberdeen fragments from a roll of Iliad 9” and delete legacy display name; remove volume number from 14433 and make ‘partial’ edition; 95545 is also a ‘partial’ edition; add biblio 3909 #108 descr. as a previous edition, add CWKB numbers for Homer (927) and Iliad (2815); and add passage details; add dimensions 11.8 cm (h) x 2.9 cm (w), Aberdeen fragment dimensions are not published; Pleiades georef for Arsinoites is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736893).

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - A bit of tidying up. TEXT: No scribal acute in fr. 1.7; delete repeated τειμη in 1.8; dot final mu in μαρναμ̣[ in 1.16; dot pi of πάντα in 1.20; dot second delta in 1.21; change final sigmas to medials in 1.23 and dot eta. Capitalize ἐννοσίγαιος in fr. 2.7; remove the extra space before square bracket in 2.8; remove <::> in 2.11 and replace diairesis with a suprastroke and commentary re: vowel quantity; insert scribal acute ἔλαχ ό(´)ν in 2.12; add square bracket κ[ρείων in 2.13; add scribal grave Δα̣ν α(`)ῶν in 2.16; replace final sigma in 2.19; do ἐ]π̣έεσσι̣ν̣ in 2.21; encode γ]ά̣ ρ(`) in 2.22; dot τοῦ̣ in 2.23. META: display name “Berlin and Aberdeen fragments from a roll of Iliad 9” and delete legacy display name; remove volume number from 14433 and make ‘partial’ edition; 95545 is also a ‘partial’ edition; add biblio 3909 #108 descr. as a previous edition, add CWKB numbers for Homer (927) and Iliad (2815); and add passage details; add dimensions 11.8 cm (h) x 2.9 cm (w), Aberdeen fragment dimensions are not published; Pleiades georef for Arsinoites is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736893).

Submit - Text encoded from ed.pr. as part of Heidelberg’s Digital Papyrology Webinar, Summer 2020. I did not how to encode the stroke/acute above the ρ in fr.2 line 22. I also numbered each column separately.
